Reviews.Title: Camera Kit by Focus Camera
Reviews.Author: Smokin54 "Smokey"
Reviews.Content: Everything was in the box that was listed and everything worked great.The camera bag was just the right size for everything I had.

Reviews.Title: amazing product
Reviews.Author: PABLO DACOLL
Reviews.Content: Very good product at the correct price. Don't forget the batteries.ry good product at the correct price. Don't forget the batteries.

Reviews.Title: GREAT Camera
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: AWESOME!!!  I love this camera.  It's easy to use and produces wonderful photos.  The carrying case is just the right size.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time. Perfect condition,and price. Camera works wonderfully. The whole package was a great gift. The picture on the camera is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Very completed
Reviews.Author: eliana haro
Reviews.Content: i like the camera, the zoom is cool, is what i was expecting, all the item specification are correct and it brings everything

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 7 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom and Full HD 1080p videos (Red)
8 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit  - BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Red) + 6pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit
